commands.entityCommands

Class FileCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • commands.Command
      • commands.entityCommands.FileCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cat, Cd, Chmod, Ls, Mkdir, RmCommand, Touch, WriteToFile

    public abstract class FileCommand
extends Command
    Abstract class inherited by commands which operates with files
    Author:
    Mike

      void computePath()
      Used to find if the command contains a path to another file of directory fullPath is used for any command like cd; Also, removes any trailing '/'

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public abstract void execute()
        Specified by:
        execute in class Command

      • computePath

        public void computePath()
        Used to find if the command contains a path to another file of directory fullPath is used for any command like cd; Also, removes any trailing '/'

      • getPath

        public java.util.StringTokenizer getPath()
        Returns:
        A tokanized String with the first path found in a command (except for the last element, the last is saved as an argument); Returns NULL when no path is found

      • getFullPath

        public java.util.StringTokenizer getFullPath()
        Returns:
        A tokanized String with the whole path in a command. Returns NULL when no path is found

      • getPathArgument

        public java.lang.String getPathArgument()

      • isAbsolute

        public boolean isAbsolute()
        Returns:
        true if the path is absolute, else returns false

      • getArgument

        public java.lang.String getArgument()
        Returns:
        the last argument in every path; usefull for commands like mkdir/rm/touch
